content: Memory Bank initialized and populated with comprehensive project context. Created productContext.md with: (1) Project goal - ShearFrac Operations Platform for fracking equipment/job management (2) Key features - equipment tracking, job diagrams, deployment workflows (3) Architecture - React/TS/Vite, Turso DB, shadcn/ui, manager pattern (96â†’12 hooks) (4) Recent fixes documented. MCP config location clarified: ~/.mcp.json is global config with 17+ servers, works everywhere. Ready to generate final quality report.
